news.title: Manipur High Court Addresses Ethnic Harmony and Peace Initiatives
news.content: The Manipur High Court has issued comprehensive guidelines for maintaining ethnic harmony and promoting peace initiatives across different communities in Manipur, emphasizing dialogue and mutual understanding.

news.title: Border Area Development and Security Balance
news.content: The court directs balanced development in Manipur's border areas while ensuring security considerations and promoting cross-border trade and cultural exchange within legal frameworks.

news.title: Traditional Arts and Cultural Heritage Protection
news.content: Manipur High Court mandates protection and promotion of traditional arts and cultural heritage, ensuring preservation of classical dance forms, handicrafts, and indigenous cultural practices.
